text.0: wunden gold (distinguished from brād gold 3105, fǣted gold, fǣtgold) probably refers to earm[h]rēade twā, the term hringas 1195a being another variation of it. (Cf. MPh. iii 242 f.) The hrægl is called brēostgewǣdu, 1211. The great collar, healsbēaga mǣst, is called bring, 1202, bēag, 1211.
